description.S: Also developed in PYQT5, CalQ is a calculator that can be used on a desktop. While developing CalQ, the main focus of this application was the frontend design. This project helped solidify my knowledge in Object Orientated Programming.

Eostrix is a web app that displays real-time cryptocurrency prices. This application utilises websocket connections to stream and display these prices. The server side of Eostrix was developed in Flask and the client side was created using Javascript.

HunterX is a CLI application that is used to find the best deals for products. HunterX takes in command line arguments such as the product of interest. This generates deals from different companies , it also gives users the options to create an account and save deals. HunterX was developed Python and Postgresql.

Salsa-Secure is a GUI application developed in PYQT5, a framework in Python. Salsa-Secure compresses directories into archived files, the bytes in the folder are then scrambled with the Salsa20 cypher. The generated file is encrypted via password and can be decrypted.
